thopilage oya aluth parapure inna manuwarnaya kiyana awajathakaya kiwwa neda "me kalakanni disnilanthayata mawa jathaka karapu welawe mage bella mirikala kanuwakata wisikare naththe ayi kiyala" ehame kiyana uuta minimaru kotiya me rata amu sohonak karana kota surapurayak wage thibuna kiyana ekane ooka oya kiyanne.apita dan sath sudak se pahadiliyi me rate nawathath minimaru kotiyata pranaya denna oona wela thiyenne katada kiyana eka, habayi thopila ekak danaganin me rata wenuwen diwidun wira sinha puthrayanta garahana un kawadahari hadigawilama yanawa kiyana eka, ee wagema ape me mawubima wenuwen diwidun wirodhara ranawiruwanta garahana thopila wage awajathaka kalakaruwo kiyaganna kalamaruwo inna oya "aluth parapura" kiyana naruma sanwidhanayata oya kiyana nama hariyanne na.

brithanya agamathi wistan charchil, amarikanu eksath janapadaye janadhipathi franklin di ruswelt, rusiyanu agamathi josaf stalin, mese kamarawata hasuwuye, dewani loka sangramaye awasan bhagayedi, 1945 warshayedi, krimiyanu ardha dwipaye yalta pradeshayedi pawathwana lada, suprasiddha ‚Äòyalta sammanthranaya‚Äò sandaha pamini awasthawediyi.
gediye wishalathwaya, katu sahitha bawa saha eyatama awenika wu suwada hethuwen duriyan ‚Äò‚Äòpalathuru lowe raju‚Äú lesa hadunwayi.

mita kalakata pera eeniya hambayange thana sitiye hadi demelluya.nathnam sakkili demelluya.issara apata aathal gannata wuwamana wuna wita demellunta pahara dunnemu.demellu guti kaha.hamadama demellu guti kanu athayi sithu apata athiwuna prithiya nimhim nathiwiya.apata joliyak athiwuna wita demala kada kaduwemu.hodama udaharanaya 1977 mathiwaranayayi.demala mudalali mahansiyen atawagath kade api joliyata kadamu.
